qiskit_vqe_framework.VQErun.handle_zero_ops(observables_list: List[SparsePauliOp | PauliSumOp]) → List[SparsePauliOp | PauliSumOp]Â¶

Replaces all occurrence of operators equal to 0 in the list with an equivalent PauliSumOp operator.
